alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued July 16 at 1:21PM PDT until July 18 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with high temperatures of 95 to 105 below 5000 feet. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains
